| HistoryText             = 
===Origins===
Inspired by the legacy of [[Steven Rogers (Earth-616)|Captain America]], the '''United Nations Bannermen''' were  ''"state-of-the-art hothouse [[Clones|Clone]] [[Supersoldier]] tech"'' individuals, with brains neuro-imprinted with [[United Nations (Earth-616)|United Nations]] directives and three basic personality interaction modes. Additionally they had [[Adamantium]] lacing, a rapid methabolism, and a [[Glossary:Gamma Mutates|Gamma-enhanced function]].<!-- {{r|Marvel Boy Vol 2 2}} -->

They were the [[United Nations (Earth-616)|United Nations]] first-strike option.{{r|Marvel Boy Vol 2 2}}

===Activation===
When [[Noh-Varr (Earth-200080)|Noh-Varr]] attacked the [[United Nations Headquarters]] in [[New York City|New York]] as a declaration of war against [[Earth]] in retaliation for his [[18th Kree Diplomatic Gestalt (Earth-200080)|comrades]]' murder, the [[United Nations Security Council (Earth-616)|Security Council]] asked [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.]] [[Timothy Dugan (Earth-616)|Director Dugan]] to authorize their first-strike option, deploying the Bannermen, which he did despite the cost (6 billion for ten minutes, each, equivalent to the national debt of [[Honduras]]), asking for Noh-Varr to be captured.
Faced to Noh-Varr's [[Pocket Battlefield]] and other technology, they were defeated despite using their Gamma function.<!-- could be developed -->{{r|Marvel Boy Vol 2 2}}

| Equipment               = [[Adamantium]]-laced,{{r|Marvel Boy Vol 2 2}} Steel{{citation}} Shields.
| Transportation          = [[Jetpacks]]{{r|Marvel Boy Vol 2 2}}
| Weapons                 = Jetpack Rockets.{{citation}}

| Notes                   = The name "Bannermen" is seemingly a play on words, the soldiers being both ''"standard-bearers"'' of the [[United Nations (Earth-616)|United Nations]], and [[Glossary:Gamma Mutates|Gamma-enhanced]] individuals like [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Bruce Banner]], the first [[Hulk]].
